title: How is the food at the PESU Boys hostel?

comments.body:
Will give a brief
1) Food is good 
2) 3 different Mess
a) Hostel Mess (Avoid this)
b) Namdhari (Only Veg Food) (Food is good)
c) Food Court (Both Veg and Non-Veg)(Food is good)
3) Menu will change everyday but it follows a cyclic pattern
4) If hostel food is bad, you have the international multi-cuIsiNE Sutta Gully

TLDR Food will not be an issue in PES
